name: WorstTank {Beta}
description:
Worst Tank  {Beta}

Hi, All!

This game was made for Weekly Game jam 150, the theme for this week was ....

"You are the enemy "

Please Enjoy Our Submission :)

The game is simple, kill your character to proceed to next level :D

The controls are wasd or arrow keys for movement, and left mouse click for shooting.

Thank you for checking out our game! :)))

WorstTank By Pacchu and PortableNuke (paz)
